column2: "Na Dina
column3: Leah na Jakob hɔn babaa no
column4: puei dɛ ɔrokɔhwɛ asaase no do mbabaa."

column2: "Na Hamor
column3: Hivinyi no
column4: asaase no do hen no ne ba Sekem hun no; na ɔkyeer no nye no dae

column2: "Na no werɛ kitsaa Dina Jakob ne babaa no
column3: na ɔdɔɔ akataasia no na ɔkasaa ayamuyie mu kyerɛɛ no."

column2: "Na Sekem kaa kyerɛɛ n’egya Hamor dɛ
column3: Kɛgye akataasia yi yer ma me."

column2: "Afei Jakob tsee dɛ oegu ne babaa Dina ho fi. Nna ne mbabanyin no wɔ no mbowa nkyɛn wɔ hamu ntsi ɔyɛɛ komm ma wɔbae ana."
"Na Sekem n’egya puei kɔr Jakob nkyɛn dɛ ɔrekɛnye no atwetwe nkɔmbɔ."
"Na Jakob ne mbabanyin no tsee no
column3: wofii hamu baa fie: na ɔyɛɛ hɔn no yaw
column5: osiandɛ Sekem ayɛ nkwaseadze wɔ Israel dɛ ɔnye Jakob ne babaa ada; adze a wɔnnyɛ."

column2: "Na Hamor nye hɔn twetwee nkɔmbɔ see dɛ
column3: Me ba Sekem no werɛ ekitsa hom babaa: meserɛ hom

column2: "Na hom nye hɛn ndzi awarwar; hom mfa hom mbabaa mma hɛn
column3: na hom so mfa hɛn mbabaa."

column2: "Na hom nye hɛn ntsena: na asaase a ɔda hom enyim yi hom ntsena do
column3: na hom ndzi gua wɔ do
column4: na hom nnya adze wɔ do."

column2: "Na Sekem see n’egya nye no nuanom no dɛ
column3: Wɔmma minnya hom enyim enyimnyam
column4: na dza hom bɛse me no mebɛma."

column2: "Hom mbisa me tsiadze nye akyɛdze kɛse biara
column3: na dza hom bɛse me no ara mebɛma: na hom mfa akataasia no mma me awar."

column2: "Na Jakob ne mbabanyin no buaa Sekem nye n’egya Hamor ndaadaa mu
column3: na ɔnam dɛ oegu hɔn akyerɛbaa Dina ho fi ntsi."

column2: "Na wɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Yɛyɛ dɛm adze yi a ɔnnkɛyɛ
column4: dɛ yɛdze hɛn akyerɛbaa bɛma obi a wonntwaa no twatsia; na dɛm no yɛ enyimguase ma hɛn."

column2: "Dza ogyina do a yɛbɛgye hom pen ara nye yi: dɛ sɛ hom bɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ yɛtse
column3: na woetwa hom mu mbanyin nyinara twatsia a;"

column2: "yɛdze hɛn mbabaa bɛma hom
column3: na hɛn so yɛafa hom mbabaa

column2: "Na sɛ hom nnketsie hɛn
column3: na hom etwitwa twatsia a; ɔno yɛbɛfa hɛn babaa

column2: "Na hɔn nsɛm no yɛɛ Hamor nye Hamor ne ba Sekem hɔn pɛ."
"Na aberantsɛ no ennkyinkyim dɛ ɔbɛyɛ dɛm adze no
column3: osiandɛ ɔpɛ Jakob ne babaa no. Nna wodzi Sekem nyi sen n’egya ne fifo nyinara."

column2: "Na Hamor nye ne ba Sekem baa hɔn kurow n’abotsenano
column3: na wɔnye hɔn kurow mu mbanyin no twetwee nkɔmbɔ
column6: "Mbarimba yi wɔnye hɛn tse no asomdwee mu; dɛm ntsi hom mma wɔntsena asaase yi do
column8: hwɛ asaase yi dɔɔ so ara yie ma hɔn; hom mma yɛmfa hɔn mbabaa nwar hɔn
column9: na wɔmma hɛn so yɛmfa hɛn mbabaa mma hɔn."

column2: "Na adze ara a ogyina do a mbanyin no bɛgye hɛn pen na wɔnye hɛn atsena
column3: ma yaayɛ ɔman kor nye dɛ
column4: hɛn mu mbanyin nyinara botwitwa twatsia

column2: "Ana nkyɛ hɔn anyɛmbowa nye hɔn ahodze nye hɔn mbowa nyinara nnkɛyɛ hɛndze bi a? Hom mma yɛngye hɔn pen ara
column3: na wɔnye hɛn bɛtsena."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔnam Hamor no kurow n’abotsenano pue nyinara
column3: wotsiee ɔno na ne ba Sekem; na mbanyin a wɔnam no kurow n’abotsenano pue nyinara wotwitwaa hɔn twatsia."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ne ndaansa no a ne yaw kitsaa hɔn no
column3: nna Jakob ne mbabanyin beenu

column2: "Na wɔdze afona anomu kum Hamor nye ne ba Sekem
column3: na wɔfaa Dina fii Sekem ne fie

column2: "Jakob ne mbabanyin no baa atɔfo no do na wɔbɔfoom kurow no mu ndzɛmba
column3: osiandɛ woegu hɔn akyerɛbaa no ho fi."

column2: "Wɔfaa hɔn nguan nye hɔn anantwi
column3: nye hɔn nsoasopɔnkɔ nye dza ɔwɔ kurow no mu

column2: "na hɔn ahodze nyinara. Wɔfaa hɔn mbofraba nyinara nye hɔn yernom ndɔmmum
column3: na wɔfoom hɔn

column2: "Na Jakob see Simeon nye Levi dɛ
column3: Hom afona me
column4: dɛ hom ama mo ho abɔn wɔ hɔn a wɔtse asaase yi do hɔn mu
column5: wɔ Keenanfo nye Perizfo hɔn mu: na mo ho suar ntsi
column6: wɔbɔboaboa hɔn ano aba mo do
column7: na woeboku me; na wɔbɛsɛɛ me

column2: "Na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Na nkyɛ ɔnyɛ hɛn akyerɛbaa dɛ edwaman a?"
